    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Order(User user)
      Constructor Order unprocessedOrders = unpersonalized, selected orders editedOrders = personalized, selected orders savedOrders = unprocessedOrders + editedOrders user = user who ordered
